displaytitle: North Gate; Bocardo: background study for The Martyrdom of Ridley and Latimer
creditline: Gift of George L. Small, Class of 1943
inscribed: in graphite, lower center: a Round Abbey [illegible] | [illegible] South
signed: Inscribed, signed, and dated in graphite, center right: North gate | Boccardo | back of Michaels | Oxford | in the wall | of  bastions | Loggan's | Bodleian | GH | 1854

titles.title: North Gate, Bocardo, after drawing by David Loggan in Bodleian Library

Album containing 99 original drawings and 87 architecture, portrait, and costume studies of a documentary nature for the paintings Latimer Preaching at Paul's Cross and The Martyrdom of Ridley and Latimer.

makers.displaymaker: Sir George Hayter, 1792–1871; born and died London, England
